text: Peavy Pond is a 2,400 acre reservoir in Iron County, Michigan. The reservoir was created by the Peavy Falls Dam. Peavy Pond is part of the Menominee Drainage Basin. It flows from dam, through the Michigamme River and the Menominee River into Lake Michigan. ==See also== *List of lakes in Michigan ==References== Category:Lakes of Michigan Category:Bodies of water of Iron County, Michigan
title: Peavy Pond
